targets.expr:
100 * (
  sum by(node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", image!=""}) 
    /
  sum by(node)(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory"})
)

(
  (1 - sum without (mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", mode=~"idle|iowait|steal", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
/ ignoring(cpu) group_left
  count without (cpu, mode) (node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", mode="idle", instance="$instance"})
)
